mapper.select: select first_name as firstName, last_name as lastName, date_of_birth as dob, email as email, phone_number as phone, username as username, user_password as password from sc_users
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sc_users (first_name, last_name, date_of_birth, email, phone_number, username, user_password) VALUES (#{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{dob}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{username}, #{password})
INSERT INTO sc_preferences (username, purpose, risk_tolerance, income_category, length_of_investment) VALUES (#{username}, #{purpose}, #{risk}, #{incomeCategory}, #{lengthOfInvestment})
